title: Fully automatic ID mattes with support for motion blur and transparency.
abstract: In 3D production for commercials, television, and film, ID mattes are commonly used to modify rendered images without re-rendering. ID mattes are bitmap images used to isolate specific objects, or multiple objects, such as all of the buttons on a shirt. Many 3D pipelines are built to provide compositors with ID mattes in addition to beauty renders to allow flexibility.
